name: Diceus
description:
Diceus provides technology consulting, digital transformation and software development services for enterprises since 2011.
We effectively combine our deep industry expertise in Banking, Insurance, Healthcare, Robotics, Renewable Energy Space & Aerospace with proprietary and proven SDLC process to deliver enterprise-grade solutions which help leading organizations from Europe, North America, UK  and Middle East to build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. 
We work in accordance with a co-innovation partnerships approach - we don’t sell hours, we take responsibility for the final products. Our Centers of Excellence provide technical advice and implement best practices in such cutting-edge technologies as Blockchain, RPA, BI & Big Data, DWH & ETL, Data Science, AI & ML, Web, Cloud and Mobile.  Our team of business analysts and developers works proactively to find the new thresholds of value to achieve the defined business outcomes and expectations. Therefore, we create projects that facilitate our customers' growth, monetize our clients’ businesses, and boost revenue.
Key facts about Diceus
8 years of successful business operations
6 business offices worldwide, 2 delivery centers in Eastern Europe
250+ high-skilled software engineers and business analysts
64% of YoY revenue growth
56% YoY Employee Growth Rate
One of the fastest-growing European companies with innovative achievements in 2019 (according to Inc.5000 Europe)
98% of clients give us 5-star reviews for Quality, Schedule, Cost, and Willingness to refer (according to Clutch.co)
